name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Locked In for YouTube - Productivity & Focus

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay 'locked in' by removing distracting elements that keep you away from your work such as recommended, Shorts, trending tab, etc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
No longer get side tracked with unnecessary videos and maximise productivity by using YouTube only for what you search for. Stay 'locked in' for your work and remove distractions, allowing for a smooth and efficient flow state.
